gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 106, Trail Blazers 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Blazers, 106-96. Jimmy Butler led Miami with 22 points and nine assists as Terry Rozier (19 points, four rebounds, four assists) and Bam Adebayo (13 points, nine rebounds) totaled 32 points. Anfernee Simons led Portland with 26 points while Jerami Grant added 24 points, seven rebounds, and six assists.
